name: AceRace
description:
AceRace 0.7.0 [Beta]

A fast pace action experience. an experience that is hand picked to be enjoyed by players. Movement designed to immerse you in the experience of AceRace 

  • W A S D  - Move
  • SPACE - Jump
  • E - (when available) Dash
  • F - (when available) Slow time
  • LMB - Grapple
  • A or D + W to wall run

Your objective is to reach the end of the game without dying once! Doing so will give you a surprise level!

[DISCLAIMER]

Although the game is SUPER close to being finished it's not perfect, visual glitches may occur and one of the next updates is maps then the  one after that will be adding things like more things to do and an actual system to "Ace" the game! 

COMMING VERY VERY SOON!!! 

Buying the game supports the developers and everyone involved so if you can that would be amazing and we at select studios hope you enjoy it!

If you need any help don't hesitate to shoot us an email!

help.selectstudios@gmail.com
